text.section: Each recipient of a Maryland HOPE Scholarship who is enrolled in an associate degree program as permitted in this subtitle may hold the award for 3 years if the same conditions of subsection (a) of this section are met.

Each recipient of a Maryland HOPE Scholarship who transfers from a 2-year eligible institution to a 4-year eligible institution may hold the award for a total of 5 years, including the years at both the 2-year eligible institution and the 4-year eligible institution, if the same conditions of subsection (a) of this section are met.

A recipient of an award made under this section shall receive the award for each year indicated in which the recipient is eligible if the recipient signs an agreement at the time of the initial award to:
Commence employment in the State within 1 year after completion of undergraduate studies for 1 year for each year that the scholarship was awarded; and
Repay the State the amounts awarded under this subtitle as set forth in § 18-112 of this title if the recipient does not:
Satisfy the degree requirements of the eligible institution or fulfill other requirements as provided in this subtitle; and
Perform the service obligation for 1 year for each year that the recipient has a scholarship awarded under this subtitle.
The service obligation begins after graduation and cannot be fulfilled prior to graduation from an eligible institution.
